metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)

subsection_analysis.refined_text: form creators don’t convert PDFs to interactive or with the interactive format. sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to interactive or with the interactive format. form creators don’t convert PDFs to interactive or with the interactive format.

the pointer changes to a different icon as you move it over a field. some text fields are dynamic, meaning they automatically resize to accommodate the amount of data you enter and can span across pages.

the Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons. you can manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form using the Fill & Sign tool.

you can manage the deployment of Acrobat AI Assistant through the Adobe Admin Console. as an admin, you must add users to the Admin Console using one of the methods described in Adobe Admin Console users.
you can change a flat form to fillable (Acrobat Pro) by either using the enabling the to fill in flat forms. the tools are enabled for the current form only.
